name: EstimatedGestationalAgeCodeIncludingMethod
title: Estimated Gestational Age Code Including Method
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to describe that the template in which they are used represents the estimated gestational age. If the method of determination by which the gestational age was estimated is known it is included in the code.),(Data Element Scope: Intent of this data element is to represent the gestational age.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes describing estimated gestational age and method of that estimation.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
